archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.2.5d: d) using only approved versions of spreadsheets (e.g. using the current spreadsheet version and an approved spreadsheet program such as Microsoft Excel, Apple Numbers or OpenOffice Calc).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
